metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16808 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Dolibarr through 7.0.0. There is Stored XSS in expensereport/card.php in the expense reports plugin via the comments parameter, or a public or private note.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
